name: Vista Outdoor Inc.
description: Vista Outdoor Inc. is a leading global designer, manufacturer, and marketer of outdoor sports and recreation products. Founded in 2015 and headquartered in Anoka, Minnesota, the company is dedicated to promoting outdoor experiences through a broad portfolio of well-known brands. Vista Outdoor operates in two primary segments: Shooting Sports and Outdoor Products. The Shooting Sports segment includes a range of ammunition brands and accessories, catering to recreational, military, and law enforcement markets. The Outdoor Products segment encompasses a variety of outdoor recreational products, including camping gear, hydration systems, and cycling accessories. Vista Outdoor is committed to sustainability and strives to minimize its environmental impact through responsible sourcing, manufacturing processes, and community engagement. The company emphasizes innovation, continuously developing new products that enhance outdoor experiences for consumers. In recent years, Vista Outdoor has focused on expanding its reach through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, solidifying its position as a market leader in the outdoor recreation industry. The company's mission is to inspire and enable outdoor adventures for everyone, as it recognizes the importance of outdoor activities for health, well-being, and personal connection to nature.
